name: Rapid Chain Transfers
description: Multiple rapid transfers across accounts forming a short chain indicating layering.

name: Structuring / Smurfing
description: High count of small deposits below reporting threshold from one source.

name: Shell Company Payment
description: Large payment to a newly created counterparty with minimal transaction history.

name: Circular Flow
description: Funds returned to origin through intermediate accounts, indicating possible layering.

name: Multiple Small Outflows
description: Many small outgoing payments from a single account in short time window.
